Quest_Description.Name: Meet the Marble Spirit
Quest_Description.Description: You hear a voice coming from behind you, you should check it out!

Quest_Description.Name: Open the Front Gate
Quest_Description.Description: The front gate appears to be locked, you should find a way to open it.

Quest_Description.Name: Polish the Rods and Clean the Display Windows
Quest_Description.Description: You don't even work here, but might as well help the Assistant out!
